openwaterhg 1.2.0.9000

Open Water Hg Report Plot Theme

Source: R/plot_tools.R
theme_owhg.Rd

This custom theme is the standardized theme used in plots within the final report for the Open Water Mercury studies. It builds off of the theme_light() ggplot theme and changes the facet label text color to black.

theme_owhg(x_axis_v = FALSE)

Arguments

x_axis_v

Makes the tick labels for the x-axis vertical if x_axis_v = TRUE. Default is FALSE.

Value

A ggplot layer that applies a custom theme as described above.

Contents

Developed by Dave Bosworth.
